forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a shower late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High near 20C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 69F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
